description: Delete a custom tape pool. A custom tape pool can only be deleted if there are no tapes in the pool and if there are no automatic tape creation policies that reference the custom tape pool.

parameters.name: PoolARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom tape pool to delete.

nested_items.name: PoolARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom tape pool being deleted.
